frontMatter.title: Module 1: Building the Neural Network of Robots - ROS 2 Fundamentals
frontMatter.description: Understanding the distributed computing framework that orchestrates humanoid robot systems
frontMatter.prerequisites: Basic programming knowledge, familiarity with command line interfaces
objectives: Grasp the fundamental architecture that makes ROS 2 the industry standard
Connect AI system components with ROS 2 architectural patterns
Understand robot modeling through URDF/Xacro frameworks
